data.message: Presently on my whole "Facebook-Newsfeed" I have been seriously bombarded by a horrid overload of Facebook-Suggestions{Ads, Apps, etc.) that are progressively getting worse throughout this long week. Also I currently seen a very suspicious occurrence regarding a "Maliciously Heinous Page-Suggestion" called J Dubs{Drugs) that has mysteriously appeared across my entire "Facebook-Newsfeed" in a nightmarish fashion. Additionally my "Facebook-Newsfeed" is further experiencing enormous dilemmas{Technical-Difficulties, etc.) & Facebook-Newsfeed dysfunctions are constantly popping up on a daily basis. Anyway Facebook Administrators, I need Facebook to fully address these "Specified Things" referencing to my "Facebook-Newsfeed Problems" mentioned today{April.14,2016) on Facebook. Lastly Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U help{SOS) me out by providing a urgent resolution{FIXES, etc.) able to remedy those "Troubles" effecting me on Facebook.
